title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: Image can't be refreshed after importing again. When a new image, 'image1.jpg', is imported into the layout again, the original image continues to be displayed instead of the new image.
EB: When a new image, 'image1.jpg', is imported into the layout again, the expected behavior is that the new image should be displayed instead of the original image.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout. 
2. Import the image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again. 

Expected result: The new image should be displayed. 
Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
